$chebgonaz_swordinthestone_desc: A mighty sword appears embedded within this stone.
$chebgonaz_swordinthestone_empty: Just a regular stone where a mighty sword once was.
$chebgonaz_swordinthestone_unworthy: Try as you might, the sword will not budge.
$chebgonaz_excalibur_desc: Excalibur is the mythical sword of King Arthur.
$chebgonaz_sunarrow_desc: Holy arrows that sear enemies with the heat of the sun.
$chebgonaz_apollo_unworthy: A mysterious force prevents you from taking the bow.
$chebgonaz_bladeofolympus_desc: Impossibly forged in this realm, the blade vibrates and trembles with wondrous and terrible power. Surely, only a god could have manifested such a weapon...
$chebgonaz_greatswordofolympus_desc: Impossibly forged in this realm, the blade vibrates and trembles with wondrous and terrible power. Surely, only a god could have manifested such a weapon...
